abstract: Yahoo posts declines in revenue and profit, which was not unexpected; profit for third quarter was $293 million, or 23 cents a share, compared with net income of $396 million, or $29 a share in the year-earlier period, a decline of 26 percent; Yahoo's revenue was $1.07 billion, compared with $1.2 billion; shares gain roughly 2.7 percent to $15.89.
snippet: Revenue, which excludes fees paid to partner Web sites, was $1.07 billion, compared with $1.12 billion last year.
lead_paragraph: Revenue, which excludes fees paid to partner Web sites, was $1.07 billion, compared with $1.12 billion last year.

headline.main: Yahoo Profit Falls 26%, but Its Media Sites Draw More Views
headline.print_headline: Yahoo Profit Falls 26%, but Its Media Sites Draw More Views
